courseDescription:
This free online training course begins by introducing you to safety and health legislation as well as general duties and responsibilities around safety and health management in schools and workplaces. Health and safety are relevant to all school principals or employers and any new members of staff. You will also learn about the safety statement which is very important in safeguarding the health and safety of those at work.

Furthermore, you will then delve into the different types of hazards which include biological, chemical, ergonomic, physical, psychological, and safety. Learning how to identify hazards at your workplace can help you control or eliminate them thus preventing accidents, injuries, and property damage. With this course, you will also learn how to measure and assess risk, plan for emergencies, and report an accident. You will also be introduced to the role of the safety committee.

This Health and Safety training online course will help you become a better member of the management committee by teaching you essential health and safety protocols applicable in the workplace or school. Upon the completion of this online course, you will learn how to identify risks and hazards in schools and workplaces as well as how to correctly create an accident report, and handle an emergency or accident. Enroll in this online course today and improve your knowledge and skills on the best practices of health and safety in schools and workplaces.
